channel.title: Compiler Help
channel.description: I've been trying to edit my server but every time i edit my server and then I compile it doesn't work, it stays the same. I don't know if it's my compiler but this is what it shows when I click compile now. [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/5nt1eg.jpg[/img] Does anyone mind setting up a new compiler?

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

Search the forums theres bound to be a guide I’m not that good at explaning but here it goes…

Change your classpath variable to this… If you don’t have 1 click new and title it classpath

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

and for ur path variable…

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;

Computer - Properties - System - System Properties - Env. Variables

Now if you downloaded the link i gave you your compiler should be working

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

I know you problem… download this java package…
http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-jsp-136632.html

And install that then try your compiler… Thats what fixed it for me… and set your variables theres guides on that

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @Imaginary Imaginary
item.description:
@Imaginary wrote:

Well the compiler works! but when I compile it doesn’t show the thing I edited.
Like it doesn’t change anything.
Help!

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

try my compiler code…

@echo off @TITLE Reality's compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @Imaginary Imaginary
item.description:
@Imaginary wrote:

It isn’t.
But when I did it and compiled it.
Still didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @Imaginary Imaginary
item.description:
@Imaginary wrote:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

There it is.

Read full topic
